title: Enhanced activity of Trichoderma asperellum introduced in solarized soil and its implications on the integrated control of strawberry-black root rot
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Ibrahim Elshahawy, Nehal Saied, Farid Abd-El-Kareem, Mahfouz Abd-Elgawad
